UK informal extremely bad or ugly: ghastly weather What ghastly weather! It hasn't stopped raining for hours.ghastly mistake It was all a ghastly mistake. I thought her outfit was ghastly. Synonyms
grim (UNPLEASANT) informal

If someone looks ghastly, they look very ill or very shocked, especially with a very pale face: You look ghastly - are you okay?
